titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for abolishing of abuses, by billes of conformity.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Against suits and decrees ... allowing debtors to compound for less than they owe." -- STC.
Dated at end: Westminster the one and thirtieth day of March, in the nineteenth yeere of our reigne ... .
Arms 12; Steele notation: of end 2)carefull His.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
